UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that may represent a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: A synthetic peptide from a heptad repeat region of herpesvirus glycoprotein B inhibits virus replication.
Literature.Author: Okazaki K, Kida H

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Bovine herpesvirus 1 (BoHV-1)(IC50 REP=5µM),Pseudorabies Virus (PRV)(IC50 REP=20µM),HSV-1(IC50 REP=40µM),Newcastle Disease Virus (NDV)(IC50 REP=50µM)
